item.title: Quick Clips - Upwork
item.description:
Stephen...
There are  2 objectives with this next job. The first objective is to create an animation with our logo to open and close all the videos we will be making moving forward. I’m not looking for anything too flashy. In the link below, I like the intro that our previous editor created. Check it out:  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y43LttiCNZQ&t=21s
Perhaps provide us with a few examples for the open and close of a video to choose from.

The second object is to polish the 2 “Get a Quote” videos. Mostly…add some music, intros and overlay the venue images when the girls name the locations: “All the Walter’s Estate Locations” ect… (The filenames tell you the venue name.) One of the videos is greenscreen and needs to be keyed to white. (Possibly we may want a studio in the background. I’ll make that decision after I see the white.)

I’m still waiting on the second video, but if you want to get going on the video you already have…go for it. Here is the folder containing the venue images: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zkEZTgPtHFYk6klfK2PHDmZYOeZi_qjG?usp=sharing


Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
